definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Finally the researches on the MHD dynamo and other kinds of dynamos are briefly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了MHD发电机和其它类型发电机的研究概况。

sentences.english: Finally the researches on the MHD dynamo and other kinds of dynamos are briefly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了MHD发电机和其它类型发电机的研究概况。

sentences.english: Ocean waves move the hydraulic fluid, which spins the generator.
sentences.chinese: 海浪推动液压油从而驱动发电机运转。

sentences.english: A nonlinear steam valve controller is designed by using the proposed method.
sentences.chinese: 应用该方法设计了发电机主汽门非线性鲁棒控制器。

sentences.english: He drew an axis on it first then fixed it carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他首先在发电机上画了一条轴线然后仔细修理起来。

sentences.english: The propeller turns a small d. c. generator .
sentences.chinese: 螺旋桨带动一个小型直流发电机。

sentences.english: The generator shall be in the horizontal position with the tube oriented horizontally.
sentences.chinese: 卧置的发电机上连接的那根管子的走向应呈水平方向。

sentences.english: The Dynamic Simulation models of typical controlled processes of wind turbine are established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了风力发电机组典型受控过程的动态仿真模型。

sentences.english: Generator out of operation due to short circuit.
The station consists of 3 power-generating units.
sentences.chinese: 该电站由三个发电机组组成。

sentences.english: This is the largest generator ever made in China.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国制造的最大的发电机。

sentences.english: To prevent blackouts, factories are running their own diesel-powered generators.
sentences.chinese: 为了防止停电，一般工厂都运行有自己的柴油发电机。

sentences.english: Check the joining su ces of the generator bearing after finishing the unit alignment.
sentences.chinese: 机组再对中完工后，检查发电机轴承接合面良好。

sentences.english: Mahboob's men lack fuel for the generators that provide electricity for their barracks and vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 发电机可以为他们的营房和汽车提供电力。

sentences.english: The main unit from another side.

sentences.chinese: 道依茨风冷柴油发电机组。

definition: to generate electricity/to send a telegram
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
